^ XT
SIMMONS:
-29- Revised
(CONT) determines what is anti-peoples music and
what is pro-peoples music. The discussion has further
brought out how destructive these controls have become,
how they force the free, soaring spirit of original
genius into the mediocrity of conformity. The creative
mind cannot be restricted to set forms and themes, or
to a pattern of ideas, beliefs, and loyalties prescribed
by a political party. Under such compulsions art
withers and dies. And so will the greatness of Soviet
music wither and die under the sweeping controls of the
Communist Party.
